<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update organization member role"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/members/{memberId}/role"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the role of the member identified by the given `memberId` in the organization identified by the given `orgId`. Accepted values: `owner`, `member`.
